titleStmt.title: A short answer to a malicious pamphlet called, A reply written by John Gadbury, the King of England's juggler, and astrologer in ordinary to the Pope, to help on the work.
titleStmt.author: Partridge, John, 1644-1715.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Partridge by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
